titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the application of section 584(h) of such Code.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the application of section 584(h) of such Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a rule for the nonrecognition of gain for certain distributions of regulated investment company stock by common trust funds (regulated bank investment funds) to their participants.
